title: La Vertu est digne de l'empire du monde; Degna orbis imperio virtus; from Le Batailles d'Alexandre
marks:
Inscription

in plate in black: [ LA VERTU EST D
description: the Battle of Arbella (or Gaugameta); Alexander the Great at center with an eagle flying above his head; Darius on chariot at right; in lower margin is Colbert's coat of arms
